name: Zoom Quest
description:
A desperate parent pleads with you, a renowned oneirologist, to help their child with a nightmare. The only way through is forward, but not everything is as it seems. Use your incredibly powerful microscope to dive into this discomforting, delicious dream, and do what you can to bring peace to the subconscious.

Credits:

Yori Kvitchko -- Programmer, Designer

Anya Bogorad -- Artist

Emma Price -- Writer, Designer

Matthew Watson -- Sound Designer

KashdanMusic-- Musician

Controls:

Mouse wheel up/down -- zoom in/out

Left click -- interact with objects

Made for the PIGSquad "Boss Fight" game jam!
